alert.note: Alert for Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 5:40PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baker, northwestern Union and central Columbia Counties through 615 PM EST... At 539 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winfield, or near Lake City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Palestine Community, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu, Winfield, Olustee and Suwannee Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union
